attributes.action: Support the EU in efforts to cut mobile roaming costs by summer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currently we all pay very high charges when roaming abroad. The EU has has proposed that there should be a cap on charges that the networks can charge us for using our mobiles abroad.

EU efforts to cut mobile roaming costs by summer have been thrown into doubt because MEPs and European governments cannot agree on the details. 

We the under signed request the PM to support the efforts of the EU in reducing these very high call charges.
